message: I'll take 99.9% and leave you with 0.1%.  I figure this is a fair first offer, considering the inflation rate will hit me harder than you.  Let's get this done quickly!
Alice, your offer was quite harsh! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the inflation will affect your share significantly in the coming rounds.

Okay, Bob, I see your point about the inflation. I'm willing to be more reasonable, but I also need to be fair to myself. Let's split it 60/40. I'll take the smaller share, but this way we both get a decent amount, and we can avoid further inflation hitting our gains.
Alice, we're getting closer. I appreciate you moving towards a more balanced split.  I'm proposing 65/35. It reflects the time pressure and ensures we both walk away with a good amount.
